name: @delesslin/portfolio
description: Build files for a vite react portfolio for DeLesslin George-Warren
author: delesslin

scripts.publish:patch: read -p 'Commit message: ' msg && git add . && git commit -am "$msg" && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public
